name: Don't Look Away From The Colors
name_original: Don't Look Away From The Colors
description:
If the web version doesn't work or performs badly,
please download the standalone version below.

12th submission for game-a-month.
Follow me on Twitter for updates on more games!

Game by Adam Pype.
Music by Pascal Wintz.

"A clever little first person puzzle platformer well worth training your eye on."
- Free Game Planet
